settings.heading: Tone Deaf – Fall 2023 Collection
settings.body:
Honor The Gift's Fall 2023 collection introduces a two-part collection called "Tone-Deaf." The Inner City has perpetually been overlooked as a melting pot of minorities – a realm upheld by a diverse range of people of color and voices that deserve to be heard.

The two-part collection, available in men’s, women’s, and kid’s styles, draws inspiration from monochromatic looks, graphics, a spectrum of skin tones serving as a color reference, and palettes that define the sidewalks of the Inner City.
